search.query: index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf NOT tokenURI="" | spath input=metadata | search NOT errorTokenURI.code=3 | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | search txn_type=mint | stats count

index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf NOT tokenURI="" | spath input=metadata | search NOT errorTokenURI.code=3 | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | search txn_type=transfer | stats count

index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf NOT tokenURI="" | spath input=metadata | search NOT errorTokenURI.code=3 | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | timechart span=1h count by txn_type

index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf NOT tokenURI="" | spath input=metadata | search NOT errorTokenURI.code=3 | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | search txn_type=mint | top to | eval to=lower(to) | lookup buttercup_nft.csv address AS to | rename to as address | table address owner count percent | head 7

index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf NOT tokenURI="" | spath input=metadata | search NOT errorTokenURI.code=3 | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | search txn_type=mint | top to | eval to=lower(to) | lookup buttercup_nft.csv address AS to OUTPUT owner as to_owner | eval from=if(isnull(from_owner),substr(from,0,10)."...",from_owner) | eval to=if(isnull(to_owner),substr(to,0,10)."...",to_owner) | fields - to_owner

index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf NOT tokenURI="" | spath input=metadata | search NOT errorTokenURI.code=3 | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | search txn_type=transfer | lookup buttercup_nft.csv address AS to OUTPUT owner AS to_owner | lookup buttercup_nft.csv address AS from OUTPUT owner AS from_owner | eval from=if(isnull(from_owner),substr(from,0,10)."...",from_owner) | eval to=if(isnull(to_owner),substr(to,0,10)."...",to_owner) | table _time from to name

index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf NOT tokenURI="" | spath input=metadata | search NOT errorTokenURI.code=3 | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | eval from=lower(from), to=lower(to) | lookup buttercup_nft.csv address AS to OUTPUT owner AS to_owner | lookup buttercup_nft.csv address AS from OUTPUT owner AS from_owner | eval from=if(isnull(from_owner),substr(from,0,10)."...",from_owner) | eval to=if(isnull(to_owner),substr(to,0,10)."...",to_owner) | rename "attributes{}.trait_type" AS trait_type "attributes{}.value" AS trait_value | eval trait_value=lower(trait_value) | rex field=trait_value mode=sed "s/ /_/g" | table _time txn_type from to name trait* `buttercup_traits_extract` | sort - _time | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tBackground OUTPUT Rarity AS tBackground_R Rarity_Score AS tBackground_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tBodyColor OUTPUT Rarity AS tBodyColor_R Rarity_Score AS tBodyColor_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tBodyOutline OUTPUT Rarity AS tBodyOutline_R Rarity_Score AS tBodyOutline_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tEyes OUTPUT Rarity AS tEyes_R Rarity_Score AS tEyes_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tGlasses OUTPUT Rarity AS tGlasses_R Rarity_Score AS tGlasses_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tHat OUTPUT Rarity AS tHat_R Rarity_Score AS tHat_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tHoofColor OUTPUT Rarity AS tHoofColor_R Rarity_Score AS tHoofColor_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tIrisColor OUTPUT Rarity AS tIrisColor_R Rarity_Score AS tIrisColor_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tMane OUTPUT Rarity AS tMane_R Rarity_Score AS tMane_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tMouth OUTPUT Rarity AS tMouth_R Rarity_Score AS tMouth_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tPatchColor OUTPUT Rarity AS tPatchColor_R Rarity_Score AS tPatchColor_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tWingColor OUTPUT Rarity AS tWingColor_R Rarity_Score AS tWingColor_RS | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tWingOutline OUTPUT Rarity AS tWingOutline_R Rarity_Score AS tWingOutline_RS | fields - trait* | eval RS=tBackground_RS+tBodyColor_RS+tBodyOutline_RS+tEyes_RS+tGlasses_RS+tHat_RS+tHoofColor_RS+tIrisColor_RS+tMane_RS+tMouth_RS+tPatchColor_RS+tWingColor_RS+tWingOutline_RS | convert ctime(_time) as test | lookup ButtercupNFT_rarity_lookup.csv Trait_Name AS tIrisColor OUTPUT Rarity AS tIrisColor_R

index="rinkeby2" sourcetype="ethereum:nft" 0xbee13ba31178b6a92c8e8d54de64512bc4f52adf | spath input=metadata | eval txn_type=if(from="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","mint",if(to="0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000","burn","transfer")) | search txn_type=mint | stats latest(image) as image
